Questions.Title: Which of the following applications would you use to create an architectural drawing?
Which of the following statement(s) is/are CORRECT about hardware components of an information system?

Answers.a: The Central Processing Unit (CPU) carries out the instructions of a computer program.
Answers.b: The memory (RAM) is normally used to store the computer's operating system, application software and data.
Answers.c: A floppy disk is suited to holding large volumes of data that is unlikely to change often.
Answers.d: MICR technology could be used to read information printed on bank cheques.
Answers.e: The monitor is commonly used as an output device.

Questions.Title: In Value Chain Analysis, which of the following is/are NOT classed as (a) primary activity/(ies)?
Which of the following is/are NOT (a) function(s) of an operating system?

Answers.b: Controlling access to storage devices, for example disk drives.
Answers.c: Dealing with errors, for example by displaying a message to the user if a fault is detected within a hardware component.
Answers.d: Informing users when a data entry error occurs.
Answers.e: Coordinating and controlling peripheral devices, for example printers.

Questions.Title: The following statements are based on application software.
The following statements are based on information systems security, privacy and ethical issues.

Answers.a: is another name for electronic data interchange.
Answers.c: helps to provide useful information for the suppliers and customers of an organization.
Answers.d: could be used to communicate company information to its employees cost effectively.
Answers.e: is an internal corporate network used by employees to gain access to company information.

Questions.Title: Duplicating the design of an item or a computer program without authorisation is known as
Which of the following mechanism is/are useful to secure data from external access and manipulation?

Answers.a: transforms data using a defined process.
Answers.b: is produced in response to an information need and therefore serves a specific purpose.
Answers.d: should be relevant as well as accurate.
Answers.e: helps to improve management decision making.

Questions.Title: Which of the following is/are included in a Physical Design of a system?

Answers.a: characteristics of the communication software, media and device
Answers.b: specifications of auditing, backup and output distribution methods to minimize the crimes  and frauds
Answers.c: performance characteristics of all computer equipments needed
Answers.d: all outputs from the system including the types, format, content and frequency of the output
Answers.e: specification of the type, format, content and frequency of the input

Questions.Title: The following statements are related to computer networks. Identify the CORRECT statement(s).

Answers.a: Networks enable organizations to share data.
Answers.b: An extranet is useful to improve communication among employees of an organization.
Answers.c: Networks enable organizations to share peripheral devices.
Answers.d: The Internet is an example of a Wide Area Network (WAN).
Answers.e: Intranets are useful to improve communication among the employees of an organisation
